Name: CM/LM PSI EQ
checklistText:
CM/LM Pressure Equalization

	a.	Vented LM
			PGAs donned & checkes (refer to
				PGA Mode Changes & Pressure Suit Circuit &
				PGA Check at 5.0 psia)

Panel 252:
		WASTE STOW vlv - CLOSE

Panel 2:
		O2 PRESS IND sw - SURGE TK
			CRYO O2 PRESS 1 ind &
				REPRESS O2 PRESS ind -
				865-935 psia (verify)

Panel 351:
		EMER CAB PRESS sel - OFF (verify)

Panel 326:
		REPRESS PKG vlv - OFF

			CAUTION

		Do not exceed cab press of 5.7 psia
		or cab press relf vlv will actuate.

Panel 7:
		DIRECT O2 vlv - OPEN (CCW)

Panel 2:
		O2 FLOW ind - 1.0 lb/hr (pegged)
		O2 FLOW HI lt - on

Panel 1, 3, 122:
		MASTER ALARM pb/lt (3) - on,
			push

Panel 2:
		SUIT CAB ΔP ind - >+2.0 in. H2O
		CAB PRESS ind - ≈5.7 psia

Panel 7:
		DIRECT O2 vlv - close (CW)


Panel 12:
		TUNL VENT vlv - LM/CM ΔP (verify)
			LM/CM ΔP ind - +4 psid (pegged)
				after 27.5 min

Panel 2:
		CRYO O2 PRESS ind - 850 psia

Fwd hatch:
		PRESS EQUAL vlv - OPEN




		xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx
		x				       							x
		  If unable to open PRESS EQUAL vlv,
			inform MSFN

			CM Pressure Dump,
			Continue prep for LM ejection
				using pressurized PGAs
			CM Repressurization

Panel 12:
		  or TUNL VENT vlv - LM PRESS

		x				       							x
		xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx


Panel 2:
		CAB PRESS ind - 4.5 psia

Fwd hatch:
			PRESS EQUAL vlv - CLOSE

Panel 12:
			LM/CM ΔP ind - ≈3.1 psid
				Mon LM/CM ΔP ind for 3 min
					& verify ΔP stable

Fwd hatch:
		PRESS EQUAL vlv - OPEN

Panel 2:
			CAB PRESS ind - 4.0 psia

Panel 601:
			REPRESS O2 - OPEN

Panel 2:
			CAB PRESS ind - 5.7 psia (max)

Panel 601:
		Cycle REPRESS O2 as req
			between 4.0 & 5.7 psia
			limits until REPRESS O2
			PRESS ind - ≈0.0 psia
		REPRESS O2 - CLOSE

Panel 2:
		CAB PRESS ind - ≥4.0 psia

Panel 12:
		LM/CM ΔP ind - ≈0.0 psid


		xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx
		x												x

Panel 2:
		  CAB PRESS ind does not stab above
			4.0 psia & LM/CM ΔP ind -
			≥0.0 psid 

Fwd hatch:
			PRESS EQUAL vlv - CLOSE
			PRESS EQUAL vlv opened
				periodically as CM press
				incr thru cab press
				until press is equalized
				at or above 4.0 psia

		x												x
		xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx
			

Panel 2:
		CRYO  O2 PRESS 1 ind - 400 psia

Panel 326:
		REPRESS PKG vlv - FILL until

Panel 2:
		CRYO O2 PRESS 1 ind &

Panel 602:
		REPRESS O2 PRESS ind -
		865-935 psia

Panel 326:
		REPRESS PKG vlv - OFF

Panel 351:
		EMER CAB PRESS sel - BOTH



			CAUTION

		TUNL VENT vlv should not be inad-
		vertently left in LM PRESS position
		when CM & LM are separeted, as O2
		would be vented to amb thru a
		1/4-inch line.

Panel 12:
		TUNL VENT vlv - OFF

Panel 252:
		WASTE STOW vlv - VENT


	b.	Pressurized LM
			PGA donned & checked (refer to PGA
				Mode Changes, &
				Pressure Suit Circuit & PGA
				Chec at 5.0 psia)

Panel 2:
		O2 PRESS IND sw - SURGE TK
			CRYO O2 PRESS 1 ind - 865-935 psia
				(verify)

Panel 351:
		EMER CAB PRESS sel - OFF (verify)

Panel 326:
		REPRESS PKG vlv - OFF

Panel 7:
		DIRECT O2 vlv - OPEN (CCW)

Panel 2:
		CAB PRESS ind - 5.5 psia

Panel 7:
			DIRECT O2 vlv - close (CW) until

Panel 2:
			O2 FLOW ind - <0.5 lb/hr
Panel 7:
		DIRECT O2 vlv - OPEN (CCW) until O2
			flow - 0.6 lb/hr

Panel 12:
		TUNL VENT vlv - LM/CM ΔP
			LM/CM ΔP ind - +4 psid (pegged)

Fwd hatch:
		PRESS EQUAL vlv - OPEN	


		xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx
		x				    						x
		  If unable to open PRESS EQUAL vlv

Panel 12:
			TUNL VENT vlv - LM PRESS
		x			            					x
		xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx

		LM/CM ΔP ind - ≈3 psid

Fwd hatch:
			PRESS EQUAL vlv - CLOSE

Panel 12:
		LM/CM ΔP ind - mon for
			3 min & verify ΔP stable

Fwd hatch:
		PRESS EQUAL vlv - OPEN

Panel 12:
		LM/CM ΔP ind - 0.0 psid

Fwd hatch:
		PRESS EQUAL vlv - CLOSE

Panel 351:
		EMER CAB PRESS sel - BOTH



			CAUTION

		TUNL VENT vlv should not be
		inadvertently left in LM PRESS
		position when CM & LM are sep-
		arated, as O2 would be vented
		to amb thru a 1/4-inch line.

Panel 12:
		TUNL VENT vlv - OFF

Panel 7:
		DIRECT O2 vlv - close (CW)
			immediately after hatch
			close-out
